Text: anyone else have audio sync problems with this?

yep goes badly wrong after the first ad break

auto must be out by 1 sec

+550ms when it gets to the 10min break should
sync it

hey guys, quick (temporary) fix.

press the J or K keys on the keyboard when in VLC media player to resync (550ms forward seemed to work)

http://lifehacker.com/5910943/fix-out+of+sync-audio-in-vlc-with-a-keyboard-shortcut
